refnamediv.refpurpose: searches through a set of files to find a given substructure

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: cdk-substructure reads one or more an input files and determines wether the structure given by the SMILES (after removal of hydrogens) is a substructure of the input file.
